name: X-Ray
tagline: Show the password of the Wifi network you're on.
body:
# X-Ray

I've been in many situations where a friend wanted to know my wifi password. I used to have to fish into my keychain access and go searching for the key. So I built something that was beautiful, functional, and that did one thing: show you the password of the wifi network you're already on. 

![Wifi password](https://s3.amazonaws.com/f.cl.ly/items/223s0p1F2u0p3305031J/Screen%20Shot%202015-02-22%20at%202.42.33%20PM.png) 

## FAQ 

### Can I see any wifi networks' password? ğŸ‘€

Nope. Only the ones that you've signed into.
